meanings.english_definition: A neurological disorder characterized by recurrent seizures.

examples.sentence: La epilepsia puede ser controlada con medicamentos.
examples.translation: Epilepsy can be controlled with medication.

etymology.value: From Ancient Greek ἐπιληψία (epilēpsía), from ἐπιλαμβάνω (epilambánō, “I seize upon, attack”), from ἐπί (epí, “upon”) + λαμβάνω (lambánō, “I seize, grasp, receive”).
